showTitle.description: Whether or not to display the title

showSubtitle.description: Whether or not to display a subtitle

startText.description: mode=range, the tooltip at the bottom of the first date
startText.description_zh: mode=range时，第一个日期底部的提示文字

endText.description: mode=range, the tooltip at the bottom of the last date
endText.description_zh: mode=range时，最后一个日期底部的提示文字

color.description: The accent color, which is valid for the bottom button and the selected date
color.description_zh: 主题色，对底部按钮和选中日期有效

defaultDate.description: By default, the selected date, mode is multiple or range must be in array format
defaultDate.description_zh: 默认选中的日期，mode为multiple或range是必须为数组格式

maxCount.description: mode=multiple, the maximum number of dates you can select
maxCount.description_zh: mode=multiple时，最多可选多少个日期

formatter.description: Date formatting function (if you need to be compatible with WeChat Mini Program, you can only use the setFormatter method)
formatter.description_zh: 日期格式化函数(如需兼容微信小程序，则只能通过setFormatter方法)

showLunar.description: Whether or not to display the lunar calendar

showMark.description: Whether to display the background color of the month

confirmText.description: Determines the text of the button

confirmDisabledText.description: Confirm the text when the button is disabled
confirmDisabledText.description_zh: 确认按钮处于禁用状态时的文字

:show.description: Whether to display a calendar pop-up

closeOnClickOverlay.description: Whether to allow clicking on the mask to close the calendar (Note: The closing event needs to be handled by yourself, and you will only click on the mask layer to execute the close callback after closing OnClickOverlay is enabled)
closeOnClickOverlay.description_zh: 是否允许点击遮罩关闭日历	（注意：关闭事件需要自行处理，只会在开启closeOnClickOverlay后点击遮罩层执行close回调）

readonly.description: Whether the date is in the read-only state, and the date is not allowed in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下禁止选择日期

maxRange.description: The maximum number of days that can be selected for the date range is unlimited by default, and it is valid when mode = range
maxRange.description_zh: 日期区间最多可选天数，默认无限制，mode = range时有效

rangePrompt.description: When the range is selected to exceed the maximum number of days that can be selected, mode = range, it is valid
rangePrompt.description_zh: 范围选择超过最多可选天数时的提示文案，mode = range时有效
rangePrompt.default: 选择天数不能超过 xx 天

showRangePrompt.description: If the range parameter exceeds the maximum number of days, whether to display the prompt text is valid when mode = range
showRangePrompt.description_zh: 范围选择超过最多可选天数时，是否展示提示文案，mode = range时有效

allowSameDay.description: Whether to allow the start and end times of the date range to be on the same day, mode = range is valid
allowSameDay.description_zh: 是否允许日期范围的起止时间为同一天，mode = range时有效

round.description: Fillet value, no fillet by default

monthNum.description: The number of months with the largest impressions

events.name: confirm
events.description: If show-confirm is true, it will be triggered after clicking the confirm button
events.description_zh: 日期选择完成后触发，若show-confirm为true，则点击确认按钮后触发
events.params: 选择日期相关的返回参数

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the calendar is closed
events.params: 可定义页面关闭时的回调事件
